mapper.sql: id, provinceId, admissionBatchId, categoryName, content, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO gk_policy_interpretation ( provinceId, admissionBatchId, categoryName, content, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate ) VALUES ( #{provinceId}, #{admissionBatchId}, #{categoryName}, #{content}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE gk_policy_interpretation
provinceId = #{provinceId},
admissionBatchId = #{admissionBatchId},
categoryName = #{categoryName},
content = #{content},
status = #{status},
creator = #{creator},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE gk_policy_interpretation
provinceId = #{map.provinceId},
admissionBatchId = #{map.admissionBatchId},
categoryName = #{map.categoryName},
content = #{map.content},
status = #{map.status},
creator = #{map.creator},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gk_policy_interpretation ( provinceId, admissionBatchId, categoryName, content, status, creator, createDate, lastModifier, lastModDate ) VALUES ( #{map.provinceId}, #{map.admissionBatchId}, #{map.categoryName}, #{map.content}, #{map.status}, #{map.creator}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gk_policy_interpretation
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND provinceId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceId} , '%')
AND admissionBatchId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.admissionBatchId} , '%')
AND categoryName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.categoryName} , '%')
AND content like CONCAT('%', #{condition.content} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{condition.status} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{condition.creator} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.createDate} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.lastModDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
